text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Death-count 4/22/20 in countries that took prompt, aggressive action:

S. Korea: 238
Japan: 281
Hong Kong: 4
Taiwan: 6
NZ 14

The US where #Trump called COVID-19 a hoax & ignored it for 70 days, faces huge deficit of ventilators/masks/PPEs:
US Death Toll From COVID-19 Tops 45,356
